I tried ./manage.py sync_ldap_user_data and get the error-message that the user not found. I guess that the reason is pretty simple:
I choose to use sAMAccountName as identifier in login and get the fullname and email from Active-Directory.
The sync seems to try a search using the email as search-criteria which can not work.
Any idea how to fix this?
Great, glad to hear the docs were helpful :slight_smile:
